text: Charlie Appleby (born 5 July 1975) is a British thoroughbred racehorse trainer who is employed by Godolphin and trains horses at their Moulton Paddocks stable in Newmarket, Suffolk. ==Major wins== Great Britain * Coronation Cup - (1) - Ghaiyyath (2020) * Dewhurst Stakes - (1) - Pinatubo (2019) * Diamond Jubilee Stakes - (1) - Blue Point (2019) * Eclipse Stakes - (2) - Hawkbill (2016), Ghaiyyath (2020) * Epsom Derby - (1) - Masar (2018) * International Stakes - (1) - Ghaiyyath (2020) * King's Stand Stakes - (2) - Blue Point (2018, 2019) * Middle Park Stakes - (1) - Charming Thought (2014) * Nassau Stakes - (1) - Wild Illusion (2018) \---- France * Prix de l'Opéra - (1) - Wild Illusion (2018) * Prix Jean Prat - (1) - Pinatubo (2020) * Prix Marcel Boussac - (2) - Wuheida (2016), Wild Illusion (2017) * Prix Maurice de Gheest- (1) - Space Blues (2020) * Prix Saint-Alary - (1) - Sobetsu (2017) \---- Germany * Grosser Preis von Baden - (1) - Ghaiyyath (2019) * Bayerisches Zuchtrennen - (1) - Barney Roy (2020) \---- Ireland * Vincent O'Brien National Stakes - (2) - Quorto (2018), Pinatubo (2019) \---- United States * Breeders' Cup Filly & Mare Turf - (1) - Wuheida (2017) * Breeders' Cup Juvenile Turf - (2) - Outstrip (2013), Line of Duty (2018) \---- Australia * Melbourne Cup - (1) - Cross Counter (2018) * Sir Rupert Clarke Stakes - (1) - Jungle Cat (2018) * Sydney Cup - (1) - Polarisation (2017) \---- Canada * Natalma Stakes - (1) - La Pelosa (2018) * Northern Dancer Turf Stakes - (1) - Old Persian (2019) ==References== Category:Living people Category:Racehorse trainers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:1975 births
title: Charlie Appleby (racehorse trainer)
